```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
```

```{r}
text <- readLines("data/bici_202212.json")
data <- map(text, fromJSON) 

id <- c()
var <- data[[1]]$stations %>% 
  filter(name == "Puerta del Sol A")
for (i in 1:length(data)) {
  id <- c(id, data[[i]]$`_id`)
  var <- rbind(var, data[[i+1]]$stations %>% filter(name == "Puerta del Sol A"))  
}
df <- cbind(id, var)
```
